website_summaries.verdict: While they face no shortage of competition, the true wireless Plantronics BackBeat Fit 3200 earphones offer an exercise-friendly, waterproof design and lots of bass for a relatively good price.
cons: On-ear controls are divided up oddly

customer_reviews.title: Problems with latency initially but sorted now...
customer_reviews.text: Good earphones for fit, sound, quality and features... Initially I had problems with latency with video streams both YouTube and tidal on Wi-Fi and mobile connections. The earphones would not be in sync with video.. However after initial set up first connecting my phone then after to my media player and then back to my phone it sorted itself out and now performs spot on..
customer_reviews.author: Unclebill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sports Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great for running and other sports, sound quality is good although if your wanting isolation like other in ear buds these aren't the best. Because I cannot keep the in ear buds sealed in my ear for very long I find that these are the best alternative, retaining good audio quality. Wind noise and traffic can still be heard while wearing these so not the best in very loud scenarios. The headphone work seamlessly and I love being able to only use one headphone at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for indoor yoga when I have others in the house making a ton of noise! Now all I hear is my yoga instructor and they don’t fall out. Only minor issue is they stick out a bit which catches when I do lying poses but it’s only minor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My BEST ever,Thankyou Plantronics
customer_reviews.text: Best sound ever , since last 10 years using plantronics sports Headphones(Marathon running and weight training)Backbeat fit 3200 is the BEST .
customer_reviews.author: Ahluwalia Arvind

customer_reviews.title: I love these for running
customer_reviews.text: I use them for running and they are nice and stay in place. The sounds are great and I don't get too many surroundings sounds at all. The only reason I gave them 4 stars is because they sometimes cut the sound off when looking down, though that reminds me that my running posture is incorrect so might not be such a bad thing overall.
customer_reviews.author: Evie D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent over ear truly wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for ages for headset that is truly wireless for running. Just can't stand a wire bouncing about. Nearly bought the Powerbeats Pro but glad I didn't, they're so expensive and Apple specific. I'm an android person. These are just great and work perfectly with Vivoactive 4 watch. So I don't have to carry phone either.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These headphones did not fit securely in my ears. Tried the different attachments but still loose. Have had many in ear hook headphones before with no issues. Think it must be the shape of the buds and the faxt they do not sit in the ear properly. Also what was disappointing was the volume on these. I did not expect them to be as high as wired or the wired bluetooth ones I have had in the past, however there was a big difference. Maybe this pair was faulty. I have returned them and will probably go for a beats pro high performance.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. C. J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Terribly to wear.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t fit on ears. Such a pain to wear, I started reusing my old wired headphones. Somehow it does look like grandma’s earring.
customer_reviews.author: SAB

customer_reviews.title: Not good for calls
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality of sound and one charging lasts a lot, but people can t hear me when i m getting a call. I have to disconnect the earbuds
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Andrada Tudorache

customer_reviews.title: Rich sound with adjustable profiles, and good for exercise
customer_reviews.text: Given the price, I initially went for a cheaper pair and different brand, but the sound quality was tinny and just not good enough. So went for these and think they're worth the price. The fit is comfortable, on the medium-sized fittings. The standard sound option is very good, with a rich sound and excellent noise cancellation. The app works well, giving the option to turn on and off 'awareness' mode, reducing the noise cancellation, and adjust the sound profile. I've used these for exercise and they were secure in place. The only potential negative is the size of the buds, although I don't mind this.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: Plantronics BackBeat Fit 3200 True Wireless Bluetooth Sport Headset, In-Ear, IP57, Earhook & Bass Boost, Black
product_meta.description: Colour Name:blackBackbeat fit 3200 – true Wireless sport Earbuds designed for the finishers. Whether you’re in the gym or hitting the Trails, you need earbuds that will keep up. With an ultra-lightweight design and super-secure fit These earbuds are your Perfect workout partner. Want to immerse yourself in music? Power up your playlist. Want to stay connected to the outside world? Create the perfect mix of your surroundings and music. Be boundless with BackBeat fit 3200.
feature_bullets: Unleash your workouts with true wireless sport Earbuds designed to deliver a freeing listening experience in-and-outside the gym. Want to keep one ear free? Use left, right or both
Soft, flexible, and super-secure ear loops provide a comfortable fit and stay put during your most rigorous workouts
Sweat proof and ip57-rated waterproof design can withstand your toughest workouts, rain or shine
Up to 24 hours of power with the charging case means you can move more and charge less
Powerful 13.5 mm drivers and a snug, noise-isolating design delivers deep bass, natural mid-tones and crisp highs

Create the perfect blend of your surroundings and music with awareness mode and sound mix. So, Chat with your gym partner between sets and stay connected to the outside world When you’re running outdoors
Listen your way with Bass boost, balanced, and bright EQ presents accessible from the BackBeat app
Seamlessly play/pause, skip tracks, answer/end calls, adjust volume and activate your smartphone’s virtual assistant from intuitive on-ear controls

My tap offers on-ear control customization through the BackBeat app — Set a timer, start a stopwatch or select your favourite Spotify or Apple Music playlist directly from your earbuds without interrupting your workout
Personalize your earbuds with my tap, choose your preferred voice Prompt language and easily install firmware updates all from the BackBeat S app
